column1: Smoque BBQ////But enough about the drama: let's talk about the food.  Oh my
column2: is it sooo mouthwatering good.  Denton J. ordered a full slab of ribs and I ordered the pulled pork.  It was so good that we just kept on eating
column3: ignoring the fact that we were on our fourth meal of the day.  Finally
column4: we called mercy and packed the leftovers to go.
